CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 19, 1954, page 8, reads: "Thousands Attend Courier Home, Food Show...2. A part of the tremendous throng who sat through three nights of the Home Fair...Harris Photo"
TitMainTitle: Crowd seated in Hunt Armory with Plymouth and A & P booths in background, for the 1954 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Trade shows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.Hunt Armory (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Crowds--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
